COMMENT_TX: ej,grisl101,P,balll901,Fighting ej,todda101,P,balll901,Fighting Lee Grissom and Al Todd ejected by HP umpire Lee Ballanfant for fighting at the end of the inning

ej,grimc101,M,morac102,Call at HP (Kicked dirt) $HP umpire Charlie Moran called Frank Demaree out at HP despite the high relay throw appearing to let Demaree slide in safely; the Cubs got physical during the ensuing argument; 1B umpire George Magerkurth pulled Cubs manager Charlie Grimm away from Moran; Grimm kicked dirt on Moran's shoes and was ejected by Moran.
$Don Gutteridge overslid 2B
$into the overflow crowd
$George Scharein called for interference forrunning into his own batted ball
$Paul Waner dropped the ball intentionally so Jimmy Ripple could not score
ej,grimb101,M,mageg901,Balls and strikes Robins Manager Burleigh Grimes ejected by HP umpire George Magerkurth
$Lloyd Waner rounded 1B too far
$the ball hit the top of the fence and caromed back onto the field
$Paul Waner thought the ball would be caught
$Arky Vaughan and Johnny Dickshot collided; game delayed 14 minutes; then a 78 minute rain delay
ej,mizej101,P,morac102,Balls and strikes Johnny Mize ejected by HP umpire Charlie Moran
ej,durol101,P,morac102,Balls and strikes Leo Durocher ejected by HP umpire Charlie Moran
$Bruce Ogrodowski suffered injured finger when struck by a foul ball
$Woody Jensen turned the wrong way after crossing the bag
$Lloyd Waner dives and the ball goes by him to the fence for IPHR
$Freddie Fitzsimmons had injured his hand in the fourth inning
$Burgess Whitehead rounded 2B too far
$Larry French popped the bunt in the air and didn't run; Al Todd trapped the ball and Joe Marty held 1B
$rain started
$Joe Bowman hurt on last play in the top of the first
ej,medwj101,P,balll901,Called third strike Joe Medwick ejected by HP umpire Lee Ballanfant
$Ernie Lombardi rounded 2B too far
$Harry Danning called for interference for running into his own batted ball
$Gus Suhr rounded 3B too far
ej,mizej101,P,pineb101,Call at 1B Johnny Mize ejected by 1B umpire Babe Pinelli
$English tried to advance when ball got away and was out
$Gus Suhr rounded 2B too far

$Woody Jensen batted out of turn and flew out; Reds manager Bobby Wallace spoke to HP umpire Charlie Moran, who called out Lloyd Waner; since Jensen was already out, there was no reason for Wallace to speak up
$Woody Jensen made another out, although he is only charged with one in the inning
game called for rain; end of season
